 in the same way a parent can "marry" their child, or an adult can "marry" a child or animal. As long as they don't break laws (such as intercourse with the aforementioned "spouses") they can not be accused of breaking a law. At any rate, no one would really believe them or accept what they have said their "marriage" is. 
 
 But in terms of how the government views things, a civil marriage is a contract between two consenting individuals. Animals, non-sentient being, and children can not give consent. For this reason they would not be able to enter into a marriage contract in the eyes of the state.
 
 For this reason two consenting individuals should be able to enter into a marriage contract, no matter who they are. Gay couples asking to be able to do this is justified since the law will be just as applicable to them as a mixed-sex couple. On the other hand applying these laws and rules to a group would require a re-evaluation of what the law says, and how it is applied. People who want to marry the same sex as themselves are asking for equal rights, while polygamists are not.
